ProblemGoalDefinition.name: ProblemGoalDefinition
ProblemGoalDefinition.description: A junction object that associated a goal definition to its parent problem definition. These junction records assist in establishing the problem-goal hierarchy in care plans instantiated from the PGI library.

GoalDefinitionId.description: References the GoalDefinition record that’s associated to a parent ProblemDefinition record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

ProblemDefinitionId.description: References the ProblemDefinition record that’s associated to a child GoalDefinition record.
